title: Capstone Project - Face Filter
question:
Background Information

In this project you have to use the facial recognition feature of AI to create an application in Scratch. It should be capable of face tracking and applying face filters.

Project Objective

Create a face filter program.

Requirements

Here are the milestones you need to achieve to finish this project

Additional Challenges

Add one more sprite to detect another face keypoint and add different costumes for it.

Requirements

Here are the milestones you need to achieve to finish this project.
Here are the milestones you need to achieve to finish this project
